original_title: Strength and Honor: Creating the World of 'Gladiator'
overview: An in-depth look at the entire making of Ridley Scott's Gladiator. Consisting of:  Tale Of The Scribes: Story Development, The Heat Of Battle: Production Journals, Attire Of The Realm: Costume Design, Shadow And Dust: Resurrecting Proximo, The Glory Of Rome: Visual Effects, Tools Of War: Weapons, Echoes In Eternity: Release And Impact,and final Production Credits.
title: Strength and Honor: Creating the World of 'Gladiator'
